sections.heading: right or power as member to bind limited cooperative association
sections.text: A member does not have the right or power as a member to act for or bind the limited cooperative association.SourceLaws 2007, LB368, ยง 31.

21-2931.No right or power as member to bind limited cooperative association.

A member does not have the right or power as a member to act for or bind the limited cooperative association.

SourceLaws 2007, LB368, ยง 31.
